sungfatcivic wrote:
> Hi there,
> 
> I am new to JUnit . Do I have to somehow insert the JUnit framework in
> my Netbean IDE in order to use it?

If you have NetBeans 4.1, it's already there. Hit Alt+F6 to run the tests.
